The broadly inclusive WamyÅ ruijushÅ dictionary was an antecedent for
Japanese encyclopedias. In the present day, it provides linguists and
historians with an invaluable record of the Japanese language over 1000 years
ago. For more details, see Bailey (1960:4-6, 18-19) in English and Okimori
(1996:287-288) in Japanese.
